title: Christmas card with three figures with a Christmas tree
marks:
Inscription

ULC on back, in pencil: [7d]
description: white card printed in green; Christmas tree decorated with glowing candles, with three figures--man wearing striped leggings with a cane, another man with a tall pointed cap and fuzzy pointed-toe shoes and a woman in a bonnet; \"Merry Christmas The Holzschuhs\" printed below image; note written in blue ink (\"Dear friends,...\") and signed, \"Dick and Anne Holzschuh\"
creditline: Gift of James C. and Kathryn L. Hogan
